input_args.passage: "Serena Williams | Serena won four Olympic gold medals, three in women's doubles—an all-time ... 23 in singles, 14 in women's doubles, and two in mixed doubles. She is joint ..."
input_args.claim: 'On the other hand, according to source, Mariaan de Swardt won two Grand Slam titles in mixed-doubles competition, the 1999 Australian Open and the 2000 French Open with partner David Adams.'
